metadata.synopsis: One-linerSteel Watchers in the Streets minibooster.At Docks roadOne of Flaming Fists - NOTE Please rename to Fist Pantella.

0.speaker: Fist Pantella
0.text: Foundries can explode, the whole world can change, but if my orders stay the same, I stick to them.

1.speaker: Fist Pantella
1.text: These common folk need to learn to respect authority. Good thing I'm happy to teach them!
